Object.Description: {equip.Cut_from_a_fallen_star,_a_deep_purple_emanating_an_unearthl}
Cut from a fallen moon, a deep yellow emanates an unearthly glow, hinting at the power fused within.
Cut from a fallen meteor, a deep pink emanates an unearthly glow, hinting at the power fused within.
Cut from a fallen meteor, a deep gray emanates an unearthly glow, hinting at the power fused within.
Cut from a fallen comet, a deep green emanates an unearthly glow, hinting at the power fused within.
Cut from a fallen meteor, a deep orange emanates an unearthly glow, hinting at the power fused within.
Cut from a fallen meteor, a deep red emanates an unearthly glow, hinting at the power fused within.
Cut from a fallen meteor, a deep blue emanates an unearthly glow, hinting at the power fused within.
All of your deaths combined to bring out your REAL anger!
Ha! Filthy dogs, your claws only hone my golden scales.
Your kind is not worthy of my attention, plebeians. Vanish from my sight!
You scurry before me like rats fleeing the flame. Do you think you can hide from my storm of conflagration? Pray to your gods tonight, for tomorrow, you will burn.
A midnight claw that glows dimly. If too much blood is spilled, light erupts
Thanks to Nickapod for making this bow!
Thanks to Nickapod for making this Quiver!
Thanks to Nickapod for making this ring!
Thanks to Nickapod for making this armor!
{equip.An_astronomically_heavy_katana._It_is_forged_from_dark_matt}
A red skull, stained with the blood of only a portion of its victims.
Known in the ancient world to be strong against the most powerful armies in existence.
A velvet cloak that sends the user into a different dimension itself.
A one-of-a-kind quiver forged by Bloodorcs to pierce through the mightiest demons.
Harnesses the power of time and space itself into an extremely harmful burst.
Legends say that the fountains of the Nexus were all made out of this one book.
A tough, reinforced helm only gifted to warriors who fight in self-defense.
A tough, steel shield coated with rough, hot magma rock that burns all enemies who dare approach it.
A devilish orb that traps your foes in the 1940s for 9 seconds!
Instead of using it to toughen up your immune system, you decide to give your foes a taste of it. It's even worse than rotten milk.
This seal is said to contain an amount of power too extreme for one to handle.
A prism once used to take control of his enemies souls, causing them to forever wander in search of the illusion they saw.
A bloodwef- I mean, blue scepter adorned with sapphires, used by an ancient sect of masterful wiz- I mean, sorcerers.
A skull sporting a crown from its past necrotic king who died to the extent of his own power.
The strongest trap ever created. Some say it stopped a giant meteor from crashing into the planet.
A cloak once worn by a fiendish Phantom. Their victims never even had time to notice they were being attacked.
A lime-green quiver woven with green cloth that gleams with the power of Artemis.
Shoots a powerful burst of death itself onto your foes.
A mighty tome used by the ancients themselves.
A great warrior who puts in major sacrifice will also take out major amounts of their foes.
Whoever is targeted by this shield is guaranteed doom. Whoever wields this shield is guaranteed life.
An orb, made out of pure fury.
Poison harvested from the floors of Oryx's Wine Cellar. It seems to work pretty well.
A seal, painted pure red with the blood of those who stand before it.
None even know about this prism. Nobody has ever been found using it. They're dead before they see it.
Used by one of the greatest heroes of all time, Vorv.
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
A key that Opens the entrance to Zylixel's Arena
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
How could you have obtained this?! Zepts is invincible!
Original description for an orignal weapon
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
Corrupted by creatures of the frost realms, its arrows will slacken assailants promptly.
A lightweight blade, imbued with frosty runes.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun
A frozen staff, used for creating powerful chilly blasts around the user.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun
A cool wand that creates a flurry of beautiful snowflakes.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun
A bow, fashioned from solid ice, enchanted not to melt. Its often used by elven hunters which live in the arctic wastes.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun
Protective leather armor fashioned from the frozen, but resilient scales of a frost drake.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun
An excellent robe, woven from icy threads. Its typically only worn by the most adept ice mages.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun
An ancient artifact, once worn by a corrupt king of the frost realms.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun
A sturdy suit of armor, reinforced with ice plating. It's worn by the bravest warriors known to challenge the Mad God.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun
A tome that allows the caster to encase themselves in extremely durable ice. However, despite being nearly impenetrable, it will melt after a while.\n\nSprite Credits: Poshun

Transform your pet into Christmas Tree of the ? ? ? ? family. This is irreversible and the item is consumed upon use. The rarity and abilities of your pet will be retained. If you fuse your pet to reach a new rarity level it is not guaranteed that your pet will retain the current skin.

Transform your pet into Red Nose of the Woodland family. This is irreversible and the item is consumed upon use. The rarity and abilities of your pet will be retained. If you fuse your pet to reach a new rarity level it is not guaranteed that your pet will retain the current skin.
Seemingly bleak at first, this prism has erratic magical properties looming inside, which affect the light it scatters in unforeseen ways.
A shield from a place beyond the gates of war and peace.
Because what kind of monster would trick their fellows with a fake one?
Held by a mighty fnatic long ago, this prism was designed only for those who had a head of disorder.
It's healthy!\nMaxes any class to 8/8 and adds a Backpack.
A commanding staff used by vile cult leaders. It has a strange force inside it that prevents it from facing forward of the user.
An oddly heavy vial found within the undergrounds of the Lost Halls. It is said to contain the embodiment of Evil itself.
A pile of eroded silt from the Lost Halls. A hint of magic remains within.
Every shot that hits a target frees the soul of a forgotten hero. Every shot that misses is trapped for eternity.
A mysterious quiver formed of pure evil and dark matter. Its ethereal existence creates a small implosion of nearby atmosphere when drawn.
This armor does not deflect projectiles like most materials known to man. It absorbs and engulfs them, sending them to a new plane of reality.
Unknown.
An unfathomable amount of strength pulses through this ring. Only the most righteous mortals can touch this ring and live.
The cursed skull of a corrupted mind. Good intentions can go horribly wrong.
A thin hood with a faded golden lace worn for sacrificial ceremonies. It has an aura of evil around it.
A seemingly shattered ring that keeps itself together with an unknown magnetic force. It only stays together on the finger of a true killer.
A sword with an impossibly sharp edge. It has been designed with holy magic to slash like no other blade.
A fine sheet of marble charged with the same energy that powers the Marble Colossus. What it lacks in physical durability, it makes up for with a life-breathing aura.
The source of power for the Marble Colossus found within his core. It is intended to give life to golems, but it can provide benefits to the living as well.
Many Rogues have tried to use this to escape their asylum. All have failed.
The blade of this dagger was once the enormous Killer Bee Queen's stinger. It remains exceptionally sharp, and could easily cut through even the heaviest of armor in a single strike.
A nefarious helm combining pheromones and Killer Honey to captivate Killer Bees into servitude.

EffectInfo.description: Summon bees that aid you in combat

Object.Description: A quiver crafted from the remains of a yellow Beehemoth, filled with razor-sharp arrows fashioned from Killer Bee stingers.
A quiver crafted from the remains of a red Beehemoth, filled with razor-sharp arrows fashioned from Killer Bee stingers.
A quiver crafted from the remains of a blue Beehemoth, filled with razor-sharp arrows fashioned from Killer Bee stingers.
Chitin armor fashioned from the exoskeleton of a yellow Beehemoth. Ultra-light and extremely flexible, yet surprisingly tough.
Chitin armor fashioned from the exoskeleton of a red Beehemoth. Ultra-light and extremely flexible, yet surprisingly tough.
Chitin armor fashioned from the exoskeleton of a blue Beehemoth. Ultra-light and extremely flexible, yet surprisingly tough.
A flexible ironwax bow created by the Felwasp Guards to defend their larvae from assailants.
A strange trap that subdues would-be pilferers with a torrent of sticky honey.
Lightweight, yet protective armor taken from the shed exoskeleton of a warrior bee.
The solid honey on this ring renews its wearer with incredible energy.
A formidable blade that was meticulously crafted over the course of several centuries by the most renowned masters in history.
An awe-inspiring sword gifted to only the most worthy mortals from the heavens themselves.
Produced from those who destroy the realm. Molded by those who live in the realm. The end of all the realm.
It is unknown where this sword originated from, but it seems to hold a power that is incomprehensible\n\nSprite Credits: Sooty
Forged from the ancients, this helm was designed to keep the strongest being alive. Those who wear this without the ancients consent will be sent to a swift death\n\nSprite Credits: Sooty
Created by the Keeper of the Realm himself, Gilgor designed this armor to keep him alive forever...\n\nSprite Credits: Sooty
An Amulet forged for Gilgor, no mortal could fathom holding this.\n\nSprite Credits: Sooty
Open this amazing Mystery Item to get any of the pet stones in-game!
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent
Consume this Item to turn change the skin of your current pet\n\nThis Result is permanent

A seal made from the Marble Colossus' head. The power of a pure and mighty paladin still remains within.

EffectInfo.description: Summon a Marble Pillar for 4.5 seconds

Object.Description: An old looking chest from the Tinkerer's vault. It contains valuable items.

EffectInfo.name: Info
EffectInfo.description: Only usable in the Vault. Use to spawn a destructible chest containing rewards.

Object.Description: A rich looking chest from the Tinkerer's vault. It contains wonderful items.

EffectInfo.name: Info
EffectInfo.description: Only usable in the Vault. Use to spawn a destructible chest containing rewards.

Object.Description: Nobody knows why this garment is so popular, but it is definitely worth the price
Yeah it may make things hard to see, but if you can't see gods then they can't see you
A singular shot infused with the power of Limon's Children\n\nSprite Credits: DexTras
Careful with this one, a single wrong step and you'll poke your eye out\n\nSpirte Credits: wyyyyyy
You seem to grow faster with this armor equipped, perhaps that's how the leviathan moves so quickly
